Plot: Kevin's mother struggles to love her strange child despite the increasingly dangerous things he says and does as he grows up. But Kevin is just getting started, and his final act will be beyond anything anyone imagined.

Plot: A corporate defense attorney takes on an environmental lawsuit against a chemical company that exposes a lengthy history of pollution.

title: The Body
Plot: A detective searches for the body of a femme fatale which has gone missing from a morgue.

title: Blood Diamond
Plot: A fisherman, a smuggler, and a syndicate of businessmen match wits over the possession of a priceless diamond.

title: Captain Phillips

Plot: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.

title: Cold Eyes
Plot: A high-tech police surveillance team attempts to take down a gang of ruthless bank robbers.

title: Lady Vengeance

title: The Call

title: Donnie Brasco
Plot: An FBI undercover agent infiltrates the mob and finds himself identifying more with the Mafia life--at the expense of his regular one.

title: Dogman
Plot: A timid dog groomer living in a poor suburb sells cocaine on the side and stays out of trouble, while trying to deal with his unstable, violent acquaintance who is a menace to the whole neighborhood.

title: Police Story
Plot: A virtuous Hong Kong Police Officer must clear his good name when the drug lord he is after frames him for the murder of a dirty cop.

title: Cure
Plot: A frustrated detective deals with the case of several gruesome murders committed by people who have no recollection of what they've done.

title: The Crow
Plot: The night before his wedding, musician Eric Draven and his fiancée are brutally murdered by members of a violent gang. On the anniversary of their death, Eric rises from the grave and assumes the mantle of the Crow, a supernatural...

Plot: An American POW in the Korean War is brainwashed as an unwitting assassin for an international Communist conspiracy.

title: The Flu
Plot: Chaos ensues when a lethal, airborne virus infects the population of a South Korean city less than 20 kilometers from Seoul.

title: The Day of the Jackal

title: Predator
Plot: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
Plot: Influential industrialist Vanger's niece Harriet disappeared under mysterious circumstances 40 years ago. As a last attempt at solving the case, he hires investigative journalist Mikael Blomkvist.

title: Emergency Declaration
Plot: After a terror incident occurs mid-flight, a passenger jet declares an emergency.

title: The Machinist
Plot: An industrial worker who hasn't slept in a year begins to doubt his own sanity.

Plot: Between 1968 and 1983, a San Francisco cartoonist becomes an amateur detective obsessed with tracking down the Zodiac Killer, an unidentified individual who terrorizes Northern California with a killing spree.

Plot: During a sweltering summer, a rookie homicide detective tries to track down his stolen Colt pistol.

title: The Train
Plot: In 1944, a German colonel loads a train with French art treasures to send to Germany. The Resistance must stop it without damaging the cargo.

title: The Birds
Plot: A wealthy San Francisco socialite pursues a potential boyfriend to a small Northern California town that slowly takes a turn for the bizarre when birds of all kinds suddenly begin to attack people.

title: The Book of Henry
Plot: With instructions from her genius son's carefully crafted notebook, a single mother sets out to rescue a young girl from the hands of her abusive stepfather.

Plot: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

Plot: A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

title: The Pianist
Plot: During WWII, acclaimed Polish musician Wladyslaw faces various struggles as he loses contact with his family. As the situation worsens, he hides in the ruins of Warsaw in order to survive.

Plot: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

title: Apocalypse Now
Plot: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

title: Paths of Glory
Plot: A colonel defends three of his soldiers in a court-martial after they abandon a suicidal attack.

title: Night and Fog
Plot: The history of Nazi Germany's death camps of the Final Solution and the hellish world of dehumanization and death contained inside.

title: Come and See

Plot: A mentally unstable American general orders a hydrogen bomb attack on the Soviet Union, triggering a path to global nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

title: The Great War
Plot: The Italian Army fought against the Austrians during World War I.

title: Incendies
Plot: Twins journey to the Middle East to discover their family history and fulfill their mother's last wishes.

title: Ayla: The Daughter of War
Plot: Sergeant Süleyman finds a little girl on a battlefield during the Korean War. He takes her and names her Ayla. Fifteen months later, Süleyman's brigade is told they will be returning to Turkey, and he is reluctant to leave her beh...

Plot: A young German boy in the Hitler Youth, whose hero and imaginary friend is the country's dictator, is shocked to discover that his mother is hiding a Jewish girl in their home.

title: Rome, Open City
Plot: During the Nazi occupation of Rome in 1944, the Resistance leader, Giorgio Manfredi, is chased by the Nazis as he seeks refuge and a way to escape.

title: Barry Lyndon
Plot: An Irish rogue wins the heart of a rich widow and assumes her dead husband's aristocratic position in 18th-century England.

title: Tae Guk Gi: The Brotherhood of War
Plot: When two brothers are forced to fight in the Korean War, the elder decides to take the riskiest missions if it will help shield the younger from battle.

Plot: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.

Plot: An in-depth examination of the ways in which the Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of several friends in a small steel mill town in Pennsylvania.

April 6th, 1917. As an infantry battalion assembles to wage war deep in enemy territory, two soldiers are assigned to race against time and deliver a message that will stop 1,600 men from walking straight into a deadly trap.

title: The General
Plot: After being rejected by the Confederate military, not realizing it was due to his crucial civilian role, an engineer must single-handedly recapture his beloved locomotive after it is seized by Union spies and return it through ene...

title: Braveheart
Plot: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

Plot: A rites of passage story of a bi-racial teen struggling for survival in Nazi Germany.

title: Army of Shadows
Plot: An account of underground resistance fighters in Nazi-occupied France.

Plot: A spirited 18-year-old woman is married off to a man she barely knows as she combats the daily struggles of living in Hiroshima during World War II.

Plot: In the 1950s, fear and violence escalate as the people of Algiers fight for independence from the French government.

Plot: During WWI, two French soldiers are captured and imprisoned in a German P.O.W. camp. Several escape attempts follow until they are eventually sent to a seemingly inescapable fortress.

Plot: In 2001, Afghanistan is under the control of the Taliban. When her father is captured, a determined young girl disguises herself as a boy in order to provide for her family.

Plot: In WWII Italy, a widow and her lonely daughter seek distance between themselves and the horrors of war.

Plot: After a shooting incident at the North-South Korean border DMZ leaves two North Korean soldiers dead, a neutral Swiss and Swedish team investigates what actually happened.

title: The Shadow in My Eye

title: Fail Safe
Plot: A technical malfunction sends American planes to Moscow to deliver a nuclear attack. Can all-out war be averted?

Plot: During the German occupation of Poland, an acting troupe becomes embroiled in a Polish soldier's efforts to track down a German spy.

Plot: In occupied France, Maurice and Joseph, two young Jewish brothers left to their own devices demonstrate an incredible amount of cleverness, courage, and ingenuity to escape the enemy invasion and to try to reunite their family onc...

Plot: In post-World War II Denmark, a group of young German POWs are forced to clear a beach of thousands of land mines under the watch of a Danish Sergeant who slowly learns to appreciate their plight.

Plot: A documentary about World War I with never-before-seen footage to commemorate the centennial of the end of the war.

Plot: A young French girl orphaned in a German air attack is befriended by the son of a poor farmer, and together they try to come to terms with the realities of death.

title: Emancipation
Plot: A runaway slave forges through the swamps of Louisiana on a tortuous journey to escape plantation owners that nearly killed him.

Plot: Three World War II veterans, two of them traumatized or disabled, return home to the American midwest to discover that they and their families have been irreparably changed.

Plot: During the war in Afghanistan, a local interpreter risks his own life to carry an injured sergeant across miles of grueling terrain.

title: Pan's Labyrinth
Plot: In 1944 Spain, a girl is sent to live with her ruthless stepfather. During the night, she meets a fairy who takes her to an old faun. He tells her she's a princess, but must prove her royalty by surviving three gruesome tasks.

title: All Quiet on the Western Front
Plot: A German youth eagerly enters World War I, but his enthusiasm wanes as he gets a firsthand view of the horror.

title: A Matter of Life and Death
Plot: A British wartime aviator who cheats death must argue for his life before a celestial court, hoping to prolong his fledgling romance with an American girl.

title: Platoon
Plot: Chris Taylor, a neophyte recruit in Vietnam, finds himself caught in a battle of wills between two sergeants, one good and the other evil. A shrewd examination of the brutality of war and the duality of man in conflict.

title: Underground
Plot: Two underground black marketeers, Marko and Blacky, sell weapons to the Communist resistance in wartime Belgrade, living the good life along the way.

title: All Quiet on the Western Front
Plot: A young German soldier's terrifying experiences and distress on the western front during World War I.

Plot: Paul Rusesabagina, a hotel manager, houses over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda, Africa.

Plot: After two Americans are killed while escaping from a German P.O.W. camp in World War II, the barracks black marketeer, J.J. Sefton, is suspected of being an informer.

Plot: An Israeli film director interviews fellow veterans of the 1982 invasion of Lebanon to reconstruct his own memories of his term of service in that conflict.

title: Tangerines
Plot: In 1992, war rages in Abkhazia, a breakaway region of Georgia. An Estonian man, Ivo, has decided to stay behind and harvest his crops of tangerines. In a bloody conflict at his door, a wounded man is left behind, and Ivo takes him...

title: Threads
Plot: The effects of a nuclear holocaust on the working class city of Sheffield, England and the eventual long-term effects of nuclear war on civilization.

title: Quo Vadis, Aida?
Plot: Aida is a translator for the UN in the small town of Srebrenica. When the Serbian army takes over the town, her family is among the thousands of citizens looking for shelter in the UN camp.

Plot: After suffering a tragedy at the hand of invading soldiers in Donbas, an Ukrainian physics teacher seeks revenge. He sets his sights on an elite Russian sniper whose elimination could change the tide of the conflict.

Plot: In WW2, an Italian Army unit of misfits occupies an isolated non-strategic Greek island for the duration of the war.

title: Persian Lessons
Plot: A young Jewish man in a concentration camp has his life saved when executioners realize he owns a Persian book. Brought before a camp officer who wants to learn Farsi, Gilles agrees to teach him despite not knowing a word of the l...

Plot: A man's story of leaving New York in 1967 to bring beer to his childhood buddies in the Army while they are fighting in Vietnam.

Plot: A drama based on the experiences of Agu, a child soldier fighting in the civil war of an unnamed African country.

title: Fury
Plot: A grizzled tank commander makes tough decisions as he and his crew fight their way across Germany in April, 1945.

title: Rurouni Kenshin Part I: Origins
Plot: A former assassin who has resolved to never kill again has his vow sorely tested.

title: The Train
Plot: In 1944, a German colonel loads a train with French art treasures to send to Germany. The Resistance must stop it without damaging the cargo.

title: Empire of the Sun
Plot: A young English boy struggles to survive under Japanese occupation of China during World War II.

Plot: Bosnia and Herzegovina during 1993 at the time of the heaviest fighting between the two warring sides. Two soldiers from opposing sides in the conflict, Nino and Ciki, become trapped in no man's land, whilst a third soldier become...

Plot: During World War I, a patriotic young American is rendered blind, deaf, limbless, and mute by a horrific artillery shell attack. Trapped in what's left of his body, he desperately looks for a way to end his life.

Plot: The World War II phase of the career of controversial American general George S. Patton.

title: Balkan Line
Plot: After the NATO bombing of Yugoslavia in 1999, the Yugoslav army pulls out of Kosovo region, leaving Serbian people at the mercy of the Albanian UCK terrorists. A small band of soldiers must take over the Slatina airport, and hold ...

Plot: A veteran Green Beret is forced by a cruel Sheriff and his deputies to flee into the mountains and wage an escalating one-man war against his pursuers.

Plot: The story of the battle of Iwo Jima between the United States and Imperial Japan during World War II, as told from the perspective of the Japanese who fought it.

Plot: In the Nazi-occupied Netherlands during World War II, a Jewish singer infiltrates the regional Gestapo headquarters for the Dutch resistance.

Plot: After a near-fatal plane crash in WWII, Olympian Louis Zamperini spends a harrowing 47 days in a raft with two fellow crewmen before he's caught by the Japanese navy and sent to a prisoner-of-war camp.

Plot: The Justice Society of America, a group of heroes aiding the allies in World War 2, acquire an ally from the future who sends them on an adventure that changes history.

title: American Sniper

title: Sisu
Plot: When an ex-soldier who discovers gold in the Lapland wilderness tries to take the loot into the city, German soldiers led by a brutal SS officer battle him.

title: Enemy at the Gates
Plot: A Russian and a German sniper play a game of cat-and-mouse during the Battle of Stalingrad.

Plot: Several months after the U.S. entry into World War II, an inexperienced U.S. Navy commander must lead an Allied convoy being stalked by a German submarine wolf pack.

title: Battle for Sevastopol
Plot: A story of Lyudmila Pavlichenko, the most successful female sniper in history.

title: Brothers
Plot: While on tour in Afghanistan, Sam's helicopter is shot down and he is presumed dead. Back home, it is his screw-up brother who looks after the family. Sam does return, but with a lot of excess baggage.

title: Red Cliff II
Plot: Second and final part of epic tale about a legendary battle that changed the course of China history.

title: The Guns of Navarone

title: Good Morning, Vietnam

title: War Horse
Plot: A young farm boy enlists to serve in World War I after his beloved horse is sold to the cavalry. His hopeful journey takes him out of England and onto the front lines as the war rages on.

title: Duck Soup
Plot: Rufus T. Firefly is named the dictator of bankrupt Freedonia and declares war on neighboring Sylvania over the love of his wealthy backer Mrs. Teasdale, contending with two inept spies who can't seem to keep straight which side th...

title: Now Where Did the Seventh Company Get to?
Plot: Three French army scouts escape capture and go behind enemy lines during WWII, urged by a lieutenant to fight rather than hide.

title: Twice Born
Plot: A mother brings her teenage son to Sarajevo, where his father died in the Bosnian conflict years ago.

title: Merry Christmas, Mr. Lawrence
Plot: During WWII, a British colonel tries to bridge the cultural divides between a British POW and the Japanese camp commander in order to avoid bloodshed.

Plot: During an attack on a U.S. compound in Libya, a security team struggles to make sense out of the chaos.

title: Megan Leavey

title: Suite Fran??aise

Plot: During the Iraq War, a Sergeant recently assigned to an army bomb squad is put at odds with his squad mates due to his maverick way of handling his work.

Plot: A Delta Force team fights for survival as an Air Force drone pilot becomes its eyes in the sky.

title: Conspiracy
Plot: At the Wannsee Conference on January 20, 1942, senior Nazi officials meet to determine the manner in which the so-called "Final Solution to the Jewish Question" can be best implemented.

title: The Last Kingdom: Seven Kings Must Die
Plot: In the wake of King Edward's death, Uhtred of Bebbanburg and his comrades adventure across a fractured kingdom in the hopes of uniting England at last.

title: The Last Metro
Plot: In occupied Paris, an actress married to a Jewish theater owner must keep him hidden from the Germans while doing both of their jobs.

title: A Bridge Too Far
Plot: Operation Market Garden, September 1944: The Allies attempt to capture several strategically important bridges in the Netherlands in the hope of breaking the German lines.

title: Little Boy
Plot: An eight-year-old boy is willing to do whatever it takes to end World War II so he can bring his father home. The story reveals the indescribable love a father has for his little boy and the love a son has for his father.

title: War for the Planet of the Apes
Plot: After the apes suffer unimaginable losses, Caesar wrestles with his darker instincts and begins his own mythic quest to avenge his kind.

title: The Captain
Plot: In the last moments of World War II, a young German soldier fighting for survival finds a Nazi captain's uniform. Impersonating an officer, the man quickly takes on the monstrous identity of the perpetrators he's escaping from.

title: Operation Petticoat
Plot: During World War II, a commander finds himself stuck with a decrepit (and pink) submarine, a con man executive officer, and a group of army nurses.
In the ancient battle of Thermopylae, King Leonidas and 300 Spartans fight against Xerxes and his massive Persian army.

title: The Patriot
Plot: Peaceful farmer Benjamin Martin is driven to lead the Colonial Militia during the American Revolution when a sadistic British officer murders his son.

title: The English Patient
Plot: At the close of World War II, a young nurse tends to a badly burned plane crash victim. His past is shown in flashbacks, revealing an involvement in a fateful love affair.

title: Crimson Tide
Plot: On a U.S. nuclear missile sub, a young First Officer stages a mutiny to prevent his trigger-happy Captain from launching his missiles before confirming his orders to do so.

title: T-34
Plot: An SS Panzer Division uses a T-34 manned by Soviet POWs as a training target, but the prisoners plot a daring maneuver.

title: Troy
Plot: An adaptation of Homer's great epic, the film follows the assault on Troy by the united Greek forces.

title: The King
Plot: Young Henry V encounters deceit, war and treachery after becoming King of England in the 15th century, in the aftermath of his brother's death.

title: Birdy
Plot: After two friends return home from the Vietnam War one becomes mentally unstable and obsesses with becoming a bird.

title: Tora! Tora! Tora!
Plot: The story of the 1941 Japanese air raid on Pearl Harbor, and the series of preceding American blunders that aggravated its effectiveness.

title: The Caine Mutiny
Plot: When a U.S. Naval captain shows signs of mental instability that jeopardises the ship, the first officer is urged to consider relieving him of command.

title: Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World
Plot: During the Napoleonic Wars, a brash British captain pushes his ship and crew to their limits in pursuit of a formidable French war vessel around South America.

title: Henry V
Plot: In the midst of the Hundred Years War, the young King Henry V of England embarks on the conquest of France in 1415.

title: Casualties of War
Plot: During the Vietnam War, a soldier finds himself the outsider of his own squad when they unnecessarily kidnap a female villager, for their sexual enjoyment.

title: The 12th Man
Plot: They were 12 saboteurs. The Nazis killed 11 of them. This is the true story of the one that got away.

title: We Were Soldiers
Plot: The story of the first major battle of the American phase of the Vietnam War, and the soldiers on both sides that fought it, while their wives wait nervously and anxiously at home for the good news or the bad news.

title: Red Cliff
Plot: The first chapter of a two-part story centered on a battle fought in China's Three Kingdoms period (220-280 A.D.).

title: Son of Saul
Plot: A Jewish-Hungarian concentration camp prisoner sets out to give a child he mistook for his son a proper burial.

title: A Hidden Life
Plot: The Austrian Franz Jägerstätter, a conscientious objector, refuses to fight for the Nazis in World War II.

title: Anthropoid
Plot: Based on the extraordinary true story of Operation Anthropoid, the WWII mission to assassinate SS General Reinhard Heydrich, the main architect behind the Final Solution and the Reich's third in command after Hitler and Himmler.

title: Midway
Plot: The story of the Battle of Midway, told by the leaders and the sailors who fought it.

title: The Siege of Jadotville
Plot: Irish Commandant Pat Quinlan leads a stand off with troops against French and Belgian Mercenaries in the Congo during the early 1960s.

title: Devotion
Plot: A pair of U.S. Navy fighter pilots risk their lives during the Korean War.

title: The Forgotten Battle
Plot: In WWII's final years, a soldier in the German army, a British glider pilot, and a Dutch resistance fighter's paths intertwine. Their choices shape destinies, impacting not only their freedom but also that of others.

title: The Alamo
Plot: In 1836, a small band of soldiers sacrifice their lives in hopeless combat against a massive army in order to prevent a tyrant from smashing the new Republic of Texas.

title: Cross of Iron
Plot: German commander Hauptmann Stransky places a squad in extreme danger after Sergeant Rolf Steiner refuses to lie for him.

title: Beanpole
Plot: 1945, Leningrad. WWII has devastated the city, demolishing its buildings and leaving its citizens in tatters, physically and mentally. Two young women search for meaning and hope in the struggle to rebuild their lives amongst the ...

title: Creation of the Gods I: Kingdom of Storms
Plot: A magnificent eastern high fantasy epic that recreates the prolonged mythical wars between humans, immortals and monsters, which happened more than three thousand years ago.

title: The Ministry of Ungentlemanly Warfare
Plot: The British military recruits a small group of highly skilled soldiers to strike against German forces behind enemy lines during World War II.

title: Lee
Plot: The story of American photographer Lee Miller, a fashion model who became an acclaimed war correspondent for Vogue magazine during World War II.

title: The Beguiled
Plot: While recuperating in a Confederate girls' boarding school, a Union soldier cons his way into each of the lonely women's hearts, causing them to turn on each other, and eventually, on him.

title: Gallipoli
Plot: Two Australian sprinters face the brutal realities of war when they are sent to fight in the Gallipoli campaign in Turkey during World War I.

title: Salvador
Plot: A burnt-out photojournalist becomes involved in a Central American revolution.

title: The Zone of Interest
Plot: Auschwitz commandant Rudolf Höss and his wife Hedwig strive to build a dream life for their family in a house and garden beside the camp.

title: The Hunger Games: The Ballad of Songbirds & Snakes
Plot: Coriolanus Snow mentors and develops feelings for the female District 12 tribute during the 10th Hunger Games.

title: Uri: The Surgical Strike
Plot: Indian army special forces execute a covert operation, avenging the killing of fellow army men at their base by a terrorist group.

title: Born on the Fourth of July
Plot: The biography of Ron Kovic. Paralyzed in the Vietnam war, he becomes an anti-war and pro-human rights political activist after feeling betrayed by the country for which he fought.

title: Eye in the Sky
Plot: Col. Katherine Powell, a military officer in command of an operation to capture terrorists in Kenya, sees her mission escalate when a girl enters the kill zone, triggering an international dispute over the implications of modern w...

title: Timbuktu
Plot: A cattle herder and his family who reside in the dunes of Timbuktu find their quiet lives -- which are typically free of the Jihadists determined to control their faith -- abruptly disturbed.

title: Kingdom of Heaven
Plot: Balian of Ibelin travels to Jerusalem during the Crusades of the 12th century, and there he finds himself as the defender of the city and its people.

title: Tom Clancy's Without Remorse
Plot: An elite Navy SEAL goes on a path to avenge his wife's murder only to find himself inside of a larger conspiracy.

title: M*A*S*H
Plot: The staff of a Korean War field hospital uses humor and hijinks to keep their sanity in the face of the horror of war.

title: Resistance
Plot: The story of mime Marcel Marceau as he works with a group of Jewish boy scouts and the French Resistance to save the lives of ten thousand orphans during World War II.
